tech_news.title: Xbox November Update: Gaming Copilot Available on Mobile, Full Screen Experience Out Now, and More - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: The Xbox November Update is starting to roll out today, featuring Gaming Copilot (Beta) on the Xbox mobile app, full screen experience (FSE) on more Windows 11 devices, the expansion of Xbox Cloud Gaming into more countries, and more!
